mapper.insert: insert into sys_oper_log (id, request_method, oper_id, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_location, `method`, oper_param, json_result, `status`, response_code, error_msg, oper_time, cost ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsonResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{responseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update sys_oper_log set request_method = #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, oper_name = #{operName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_url = #{operUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_ip = #{operIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_location = #{operLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_param = #{operParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, json_result = #{jsonResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, response_code = #{responseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_time = #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, request_method, oper_id, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_location, `method`, oper_param, json_result, `status`, response_code, error_msg, oper_time, cost from sys_oper_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
